title: JavaScript Developer (Freelance) Job at AtlanticRide
content:
AtlanticRide is a dynamic and informative blog focused on sharing business, career, and education knowledge. It also has a consultant section where we leverage advanced AI and machine learning to proffer solutions to real world problems for our clients. We are passionate about providing valuable content to our readers.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: JavaScript Developer (Freelance)

Job Location:  Nigeria
Employment Type: Contract

Job Description
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We're looking for a skilled Freelance JavaScript Developer to help us with a few important fixes and enhancements on our existing web application. This is a short-term, intensive project with an estimated duration of one week.


About the Project


	Our application needs immediate attention in a few key areas. You'll be working to resolve existing issues and implement minor feature improvements to optimize performance and user experience. We'll provide you with detailed documentation and direct access to our team for any questions.


Project Duration


	This is a one-week contract position. We're looking for someone who can hit the ground running and dedicate their full attention to this project for the duration. Depending on the outcome, we can extend the contract.


Your Responsibilities


	Identifying and fixing bugs within the existing JavaScript codebase.
	Implementing minor feature enhancements as specified.
	Ensuring the stability and performance of the application.
	Communicating progress and any challenges encountered.


Requirements
What We're Looking For:


	Proven experience with JavaScript development.
	Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to work independently and efficiently.
	Excellent communication skills to collaborate effectively.
	A strong portfolio or examples of previous JavaScript projects.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Resume to: contact@atlanticride.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: General Manager Job at Espritsor Enterprises
content:
Espritsor - An HR and recruitment service company duly registered with CAC, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: General Manager
Job Location: Kado, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a seasoned General Manager to lead our rapidly growing real estate firm in Abuja. This is an exceptional opportunity for a creative, meticulous, and results-driven leader to transform ambitious ideas into tangible success.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Strategic & Operational Leadership: Drive business objectives through meticulous planning, operational excellence, and effective management of real estate acquisitions, development, and sales.
	Sales & Business Development: Lead high-value negotiations, ensure successful deal closures, and identify new business opportunities to expand our market presence.
	Administrative & Financial Oversight: Manage comprehensive administrative functions, including budgeting, financial oversight, and regulatory compliance.
	Innovation & Technology Adoption: Champion the use of modern applications, including AI tools, social media strategies, and advanced administration/financial software.
	Team & Event Management: Lead and mentor a diverse team, fostering a culture of collaboration, and expertly plan and execute high-impact real estate events.


Required Qualifications & Experience


	Education: Bachelor's degree in Real Estate, Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field; Master's degree or relevant certifications preferred.
	Extensive Real Estate Experience: Proven track record in real estate management, business operations, and regulatory compliance.
	Sales & Negotiation Expertise: Demonstrated success in sales negotiation and closing deals.
	Strategic & Meticulous Planner: Highly organized with the ability to execute flawlessly.
	Problem-Solving & Digital Literacy: Exceptional creative problem-solver, highly conversant with modern applications, including AI and social media.
	Residency: Must be currently resident in Abuja, FCT.


Salary
N400,000 - N550,000 per month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their comprehensive CV and a cover letter detailing their relevant experience and why they are the ideal candidate for this role to espritsorng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

title: Job Openings at Express Resource Connect
content:
Express Resource Connect was launched in 2020 as a response to developing a home grown business management solution simplified enough to be used by an owner manager of any business or an enterprise with multiple business processes and employees. We offer a comprehensive business management solution, empowering smal, mid-size, and large enterprises to automate, digitise, and seamlessly manage al their business operations in one integrated platform.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Pastry Chef

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a passionate and diligent Pastry Chef to join our team! This role is ideal for someone in their 20s, preferably female, who is enthusiastic about baking and delivering great customer service.
	While prior expertise in pastries is not required, a willingness to learn and a strong work ethic are essential.


Key Responsibilities


	Assist in preparing a variety of pastries, baked goods, and desserts
	Maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the kitchen and work area
	Greet and serve customers courteously and professionally
	Follow recipes and instructions with attention to detail
	Collaborate with team members to ensure smooth kitchen operations
	Uphold the values of honesty, diligence, and responsibility.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 0 - 1 year of experience.
	Female (Preferred), aged in 20s
	Basic knowledge or interest in baking (training can be provided)
	Excellent customer service and communication skills
	Hardworking, trustworthy, and reliable
	Willingness to work Monday to Saturday.


What We Offer


	On-the-job training in pastry and dessert preparation
	Supportive and friendly work environment
	Opportunities to grow your skills in the culinary space.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@express-resource.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

2.) Chef (Line Cook / Sous Chef)

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are hiring skilled and passionate chefs for a dynamic and fast-growing reputable food service team.
	You’ll be responsible for preparing meals according to our set recipes and standards, maintaining cleanliness and food safety, and ensuring efficient kitchen operations in a fast-paced environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and cook meals based on the daily menu (includes breakfast bowls, sandwiches, rice bowls, shawarma, fries, wraps, lunch, finger foods and more) gourmet style.
	Ensure portions, plating, and food presentation are consistent with brand standards.
	Maintain cleanliness of the kitchen and adhere to hygiene regulations.
	Monitor stock levels and communicate low inventory to management.
	Support food prep, storage, and kitchen organization.
	Maintain speed and accuracy during rush hours.
	Assist with menu development and specials where needed.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications
	Minimum 2 years of experience in a professional kitchen or fast-casual restaurant.
	Knowledge of food safety, health standards, and kitchen best practices.
	Ability to work under pressure and in a team.
	Culinary training or relevant certification is a plus.
	Good communication and time management skills.
	Passion for food, consistency, and quality.


What We Offer


	Competitive pay and performance-based incentives.
	On-the-job training and career development opportunities.
	A vibrant, team-oriented work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@express-resource.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Operations Associate

Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for smart, energetic, and reliable Operations Associates to support the daily front-of-house and back-of-house activities at our campus location.
	You will rotate across different duties including order handling, packaging, inventory support, and customer engagement, ensuring smooth, fast, and friendly service throughout the day.


Roles & Responsibilities
Order:


	Greet customers warmly and guide them through the menu.
	Take customer orders accurately via POS or mobile platforms.
	Process payments (cash, card, digital).
	Confirm orders with the kitchen and update customers on wait times.


Packaging:


	Assemble and package meals for dine-in, takeaway, and delivery.
	Ensure correct order items and quality checks before handing off.
	Label, bag, and dispatch orders neatly and efficiently.
	Maintain cleanliness of the packaging station.


Inventory:


	Track and report packaging, disposables, and drink stock daily.
	Restock service stations and prep areas as needed.
	Alert management to low or missing inventory items.
	Support receiving and organizing weekly stock deliveries.


Customer Experience:


	Monitor dining and pickup areas for cleanliness and customer needs.
	Handle basic customer complaints or escalate them to supervisors.
	Collect customer feedback and assist with surveys or loyalty efforts.
	Help set up promotional materials or display new menu items.


Requirements


	1–2 years of experience in a food service, retail, or customer-facing role.
	Strong communication and teamwork skills.
	Friendly and respectful attitude toward students and staff.
	Ability to multitask and stay organized during peak hours.
	Tech-savvy (POS, order apps); training will be provided.
	SSCE or ND minimum; undergraduate students may apply if available during assigned shifts.
	Willingness to work weekends and rotating shifts.


What We Offer


	Competitive pay and performance-based incentives.
	On-the-job training and career development opportunities.
	A vibrant, team-oriented work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@express-resource.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Administrative Assistant Job at Uptitek Limited
content:
Uptitek Limited is a leading software company specializing in the development and implementation of Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Government Resource Planning (GRP) solutions. With a diverse portfolio of over 50 custom-built applications, we cater to the needs of businesses, governments, and other organizations worldwide.

At Uptitek, we take pride in our role as product owners, driving innovation and efficiency through cutting-edge software solutions. Our team of skilled developers and industry experts collaborate closely with clients to understand their unique requirements and deliver tailored solutions that streamline operations, enhance productivity, and drive growth.
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative Assistant
Job Location: Owerri, Imo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	As an Administrative Assistant, you will play a crucial role in supporting our company’s operations by handling all administrative tasks that do not involve coding or software development.
	Your work will enable our technical and management teams to focus on their core responsibilities by ensuring efficient office and administrative management.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage daily administrative operations including scheduling meetings, organizing calendars, and coordinating appointments.
	Handle correspondence such as emails, phone calls, and mail on behalf of the management and teams.
	Maintain and organize company records, files, and documentation both physical and digital.
	Assist in preparing reports, presentations, and documentation as needed.
	Support onboarding and offboarding processes for employees.
	Organize company events, meetings, and travel arrangements.
	Coordinate office supplies inventory and procurement.
	Liaise with vendors, clients, and internal teams to facilitate smooth communication.
	Assist with basic bookkeeping and expense tracking.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures in administrative tasks.


Qualifications


	Proven experience as an administrative assistant or in a similar administrative role.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking skills with keen attention to detail.
	Strong verbal and written communication abilities.
	Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and general office software.
	Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.
	Self-motivated, proactive, and able to work independently or as part of a team.
	Experience in a tech or software environment is a plus but not required.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV and Cover Letter to: contactus@uptitek.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only candidates residing in Owerri, Imo State will be considered.

title: Human Resource Manager Job at Flavours Master Restaurant
content:
Flavours Master Restaurant is a vibrant and rapidly expanding restaurant brand, distinguished as a true culinary destination. We pride ourselves on offering an unparalleled dining experience, featuring a meticulously crafted menu that journeys from the sophisticated tastes ofcontinental cuisine to the rich, authentic flavours of Africana dishes, complemented by an array of delightful snacks. Our commitment extends beyond the plate; we are dedicated to fostering a culture of operational excellence, continuous innovation, and outstanding customer satisfaction. Joining Flavours Master means becoming part of a passionate team poised for significant growth and impact in the dynamic hospitality sector.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Position: Human Resource Manager

Job Location: Lagos

About the Role


	We are seeking a dedicated and organized Human Resources Manager to join our organization. The ideal candidate will be a detail-oriented individual with strong organizational and communication skills.


Responsibilities


	Coordinate recruitment and onboarding processes, including screening resumes, scheduling interviews, and conducting background checks.
	Maintain accurate employee records, including personnel files, attendance records, and performance evaluations.
	Process payroll and benefits administration.
	Coordinate employee training and development programs.
	Assist with employee relations and resolving employee concerns.
	Provide administrative support to the MD, including scheduling meetings, preparing reports, and managing correspondence.


Qualifications


	Candidates should possess a Degree in Human Resources or similar course
	Strong organizational and time management skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: susaneze5@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
